text: Hamono Alloh şumoro farmon medihad, to amonatro ʙa sohiʙonaşon ʙirasoned, pas agar kase amonatro ʙa ƣajri sohiʙaş doda ʙoşad, amonatro narasondaast. Va hangome ki mijoni mardum hukm mekuned, az rūi adl hukm kuned, hamono Alloh şumoro ʙa ʙehtarin hukmho pand medihad, haroina Alloh şunavo va ʙino ast
